business_highlights:
partnership with Novartis for marketing and distribution of the Ultibro 
Breezhaler.

partnership with Novartis 
effective October 1st to market the respiratory portfolio in the Australian market.

partnership with Novartis, we 
are working towards bringing our EM biosimilar franchise to fruition with Pegfilgrastim filed in 
Malaysia and approval received for clinical trials of Bevacizumab in Algeria.
partnership with another company on a fairly significant MDI.

acquired Mirren portfolio growing strongly, Cipla is the third largest player in the OTC 
market capturing a market share of 6.
